Bash(git -C /Users/denis/Documents/labtiva/stoptail commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add node stats and fielddata data layer for TUI

Implement Phase 1 data layer with NodeStats, FielddataInfo, 
FielddataByIndex, and NodesState types. Add fetch methods for 
node statistics via _cat/nodes API, fielddata by field via 
_cat/fielddata API, and fielddata by index via _nodes/stats API.
Results are aggregated across nodes and sorted by size with top 20.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
